column2: Sabbath School and Services at Sanctuary Adventist Church
column3: We went to the Sanctuary Adventist Church. It is an active church in the Mojave Desert. It has both Sabbath School and Services.The church was also the film site for the Quentin Taratino movie Kill Bill.

We all know the movie and it's why we drive out hereLots of No Tresspassing signs with dire threats if caughtBeautiful building but it was locked so I couldn't get insideServices every Sunday....Wonder if I should return?
